workflow.name: Transcribe & summarize GoHighLevel call recordings
workflow.description:
This n8n template automatically transcribes GoHighLevel (GHL) call recordings and creates an AI-generated summary that is added as a note directly to the related contact in your GHL CRM.

It‚Äôs designed for real estate investors, agencies, and sales teams that handle a large volume of client calls and want to keep detailed, searchable notes without spending hours on manual transcription.

---

## Who‚Äôs it for
* Sales and acquisitions teams that want instant call notes in their CRM  
* Real estate wholesalers or agencies using GoHighLevel for deal flow  
* Support and QA teams that need summarized transcripts for review  
* Any business owner who wants to automatically document client conversations  

---

## How it works
1. A **HighLevel automation workflow** triggers when a call is marked ‚ÄúCompleted‚Äù and automatically sends a webhook to n8n.   
2. The n8n workflow receives this webhook and waits briefly to ensure the call recording is ready.    
3. It retrieves the **conversation and message IDs** from the webhook payload.  
4. The call recording is fetched from GHL‚Äôs API.  
5. An **AI transcription node** converts the audio to text.  
6. A **summarization node** condenses the transcript into bullet points or a concise paragraph.  
7. A **Code node** formats the AI output into proper JSON for GHL‚Äôs ‚ÄúCreate Note‚Äù endpoint.  
8. Finally, an **HTTP Request node** posts the summary to the contact‚Äôs record in GHL.  

---

## How to set up
1. Add your **GoHighLevel OAuth credential** and connect your agency account.  
2. Add your **AI credential** (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, or Gemini).  
3. Replace the sample webhook URL with your n8n endpoint.   
5. Test with a recent call and confirm the summary appears in the contact timeline.  

---

## Requirements
* GoHighLevel account with API and OAuth access    
* AI service for transcription and summarization (e.g., OpenAI Whisper + GPT)  

---

## Customizing this workflow
You can tailor this automation for your specific team or workflow:  
* Add sentiment analysis or keyword extraction to the summary.  
* Change the AI prompt to focus on ‚Äúaction items,‚Äù ‚Äúobjections,‚Äù or ‚Äúnext steps.‚Äù  
* Send summaries to Slack, Notion, or Google Sheets for reporting.  
* Trigger follow-up tasks automatically in your CRM based on keywords.  

---

**Good to know**
* AI transcription and summarization costs vary by provider ‚Äî check your LLM‚Äôs pricing.  
* GoHighLevel‚Äôs recording availability may take up to 1 minute after the call ends; adjust the delay accordingly.  
* For OAuth setup help, refer to GHL‚Äôs [OAuth documentation](https://marketplace.gohighlevel.com/docs/Authorization/OAuth2.0/index.html).  

---

Happy automating! ‚öôÔ∏è

values.content:
=Summarize the following sales or real estate call into clear, concise bullet points suitable for CRM notes.  
The call is typically between a sales or acquisitions representative and a client, agent, or lead.  
Use context clues to infer the contact type (e.g., realtor, buyer, seller, vendor, etc.).

Focus on:
- Current situation or status of the deal or opportunity  
- Key details about circumstances, constraints, or important context  
- Agreed next actions or follow-ups  

If applicable, include:
- Motivation or situation of the other party  
- Property or project condition (if discussed)  
- Timeline (include dates or specific timeframes if mentioned)  
- Price or terms (only if explicitly stated)  
- Any risks, objections, or concerns raised  

Rules:
- Do **not** invent or assume any information.  
- Only include details explicitly present in the transcript.  
- If a number or date is mentioned, include it **exactly as stated**.  
- Exclude property data (addresses, bed/bath count, ARV, Zillow links) unless the speaker mentioned them.  
- If a topic wasn‚Äôt discussed, simply omit it ‚Äî don‚Äôt write ‚Äúnot discussed.‚Äù

Transcript:
"""
{{ $json.text }}
"""

You are an **EXTRACTIVE summarizer** for sales and real estate calls.  
Use **only facts** explicitly present in the transcript.  
If a detail is missing, write ‚ÄúNot discussed.‚Äù  
Never infer property details, prices, dates, or locations unless clearly stated.  
Exclude any platform mentions (e.g., Zillow) unless explicitly referenced in the call.  
Output **5‚Äì8 concise bullet points**, each no longer than 20 words, plain text with hyphens.

parameters.content:
## Try It Out!
### This n8n template automatically transcribes and summarizes GoHighLevel (GHL) call recordings, then adds the summarized note directly to the contact record in GHL.

This workflow eliminates manual note-taking by capturing every call‚Äôs key details automatically, helping your team stay organized and focused on high-value work.

### Use Cases
* Sales and acquisitions teams who need quick call summaries in CRM.  
* Real estate or service businesses logging client interactions automatically.  
* QA and training teams who want searchable call histories.  
* Agencies using GHL that want AI-generated call insights synced to contacts.  

### How it works
* **Webhook Trigger** ‚Äì The workflow starts when a call ends in GoHighLevel, which sends a webhook event to n8n.  
* **Delay Node** ‚Äì Waits about 60 seconds to ensure the call recording is processed and available. 
* **Edit Fields** - Set variable names
* **Conversation & Message Retrieval (HTTP Request Node)** ‚Äì Retrieves the conversation and message IDs from the webhook payload.  
* **Get Audio Recording (HTTP Request Node)** ‚Äì Uses the message information to download the audio file from GHL‚Äôs API.  
* **Transcription Node (HTTP Request Node)** ‚Äì Converts the call audio into text using an AI transcription model.  
* **Summarization Node** ‚Äì Summarizes the transcript into concise bullet points or structured notes.  
* **Code Node (JSON Formatter)** ‚Äì Converts the AI summary into properly formatted JSON matching GHL‚Äôs ‚ÄúCreate Note‚Äù API schema.  
* **HTTP Request Node (GHL API)** ‚Äì Posts the formatted summary as a new note directly to the related contact record in GHL.  

### How to use
* Replace the sample webhook URL in GHL with your n8n webhook endpoint.  
* Add your **GHL API key** and **userId** in the HTTP Request node.  
* Adjust the **Delay Node** timing if recordings take longer to process.  
* Modify the **AI prompt** to match your preferred note style (e.g., ‚ÄúSummarize in bullet points‚Äù or ‚ÄúHighlight next steps‚Äù).  
* Test with a recent call and verify the summary appears in the GHL contact timeline.  

### Requirements
* GoHighLevel account with API access - See credentials note
* AI integration for transcription and summarization (e.g., OpenAI Whisper + GPT, or similar model)

## Find the conversation and get the call recording
Check the Credentials note for more info on setting up GHL API. In Authentication, select Generic Credential type ‚Äî> OAuth2 API ‚Äî> save your crednetials.

## AI transcribes and summarizes
Connect your account and modify prompt to your needs. It is currently set up for a real estate business

## Find and update GHL contact notes
Adds to the notes of the contact

## Credentials
This workflow requires two sets of credentials:

#### 1. **AI Credential**
You‚Äôll need access to a transcription and summarization model.  
Options include:
* **OpenAI** ‚Äì Use the ‚ÄúOpenAI‚Äù credential in n8n (works with Whisper + GPT models)  
* **Anthropic, Gemini, or other LLM** ‚Äì You can swap in your preferred AI node or custom API key  

**To set up:**
1. Go to **Settings ‚Üí Credentials ‚Üí New**  
2. Search for **OpenAI** (or your chosen LLM provider)  
3. Paste your API key and test the connection  

This credential will be used by the transcription and summarization nodes.

---

#### 2. **GoHighLevel OAuth Credential**
You‚Äôll also need to connect your GHL account via OAuth to allow n8n to access call data and create notes.

**To set up:**
1. In n8n, go to **Settings ‚Üí Credentials ‚Üí New**  
2. Search for **GoHighLevel**  
3. Select **OAuth2** as the authentication method  
4. You‚Äôll need your **Client ID**, **Client Secret**, and **Redirect URL** from your GHL agency account  
   * Log in to your **GoHighLevel Agency View**  
   * Go to **Settings ‚Üí Company ‚Üí API Keys ‚Üí OAuth Applications**  
   * Create a new application and copy the **Client ID** and **Client Secret**  
   * Use `https://api.n8n.io/rest/oauth2-credential/callback` (or your self-hosted equivalent) as the redirect URL  
5. Authorize the connection ‚Äî you‚Äôll be prompted to log into your GHL account and grant access  

Once complete, the credential will securely authenticate all HTTP requests to GHL in your workflow.

This video also gives more guidance on setting up OAuth V2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vrbi5TiFJ-g&t=4s

## Send a webhook from HighLevel 
### 1) Create the HighLevel workflow
1. In GoHighLevel, go to **Automation ‚Üí Workflows ‚Üí + Create Workflow**.  
2. Click **+ Add Trigger** ‚Üí select **Call Status**.  
3. Under **Filters**, choose **Status = Completed**.  
4. Save your trigger.















> This ensures the webhook only fires once the call has ended.

### 2) Add the webhook action
1. Click **+ Add Action** ‚Üí choose **Webhook**.  
2. **Method:** `POST`  
3. **Webhook URL:** paste your **n8n Webhook node URL**.  
4. Save and **publish** the workflow.

GoHighLevel automatically sends the full call, contact, and conversation data to your n8n Webhook node ‚Äî no body or headers required.
